title: Schools in China are making AI part of the curriculum
description: While debate rages in the U.S. about the merits and risks of AI in schools, it a state-mandated part of the curriculum in China, as the authorities try to create a pool of AI-savvy professionals.

title: Cisco AI Summit 2026 brings the world’s most influential AI leaders together to define what comes next
description: The upcoming Cisco AI Summit on February 3, 2026, brings together global technology leaders to explore how artificial intelligence is shifting from experimental tools to core infrastructure. With a diverse lineup that includes executives from top tech firms, the summit will focus on real-world impact, the challenges of scaling AI, and the strategic decisions that will determine how businesses and society benefit from AI innovations.

title: New AI rules for NYC schools coming this month as tech upends classrooms
description: Some public school parents are uneasy about their kids using AI. Parents said the city has been slow to come up with clear policies on AI, leading to a spike in plagiarism and privacy risks. [ more › ]

title: University of Doha for Science and Technology advances innovation and entrepreneurship and AI at the Web Summit
